channel.title: I cant get the guides to work
channel.description:
i guess im too dumb or something but i seem to be having trouble with all the guides i have tried. i usually get stuck around the port fowarding... and if i get done with the port fowarding then when i start to mod the server it never works :confused:
can someone please help me??

item.title: I cant get the guides to work
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

k so that means i got the port fowarding right if you are right. how do i (compile) my server? and when im done doing that how do i get it to where i can play on it? because… like i said… none of the guides work

Read full topic
item.source: I cant get the guides to work

item.title: I cant get the guides to work
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

yea if u r lazt just do 1 to 65000 if no then just do like 43593 to 43595, service name is just a descriptiion i think, protocal u leave at both, and i think you put basehost port at 43594 for ip put ur ip on the network, like mines 192.168.1.101, to find yours i think you go right click on ur network connection and click status then click the 2nd tab at the top of that window
edit: your network ip is not the one u typed to get to ur router page

Read full topic
item.source: I cant get the guides to work

item.title: I cant get the guides to work
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

lol yea i have a router i type in the ip thing and i can get it to say some

service name:_________
global port name: to
base host port :____
protocol: tcp udp

want the port to be 43594 but i dont know how to fill that out… any help?
and after that i try to enable it and it says
click ok for host
click cancle for dynamic

i click ok and it asks for ip
do i put in ip or defalt gateway?

Read full topic

item.title: I cant get the guides to work
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

do you compile? no changes will work unless you compile, and port forwarding isnt to hard with most routers(make sure yo have a router b4 you attempt to port forward o router = no port forwarding)
